alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 10:21AM CDT until May 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...Southeast Hill and Navarro Counties. * WHEN...Until 130 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Corsicana, Kerens, Hubbard, Trinidad, Blooming Grove, Dawson, Angus, Barry, Navarro, Bynum, Rice, Frost, Retreat, Oak Valley, Mildred, Mount Calm, Eureka, Malone, Richland and Goodlow.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
